mdRecord.dcterms:title: Two tracts shewing, that Americans, born before the Independence, are, by the law of England, not aliens: first, a discussion, &c., second, a reply, &c / by John Reeves
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Reeves, John, 1752?-1829
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for W. Reed ... by T. Davison ...
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Tract no. 1: A discussion on the question, whether inhabitants of the United States, born there before the Independence, are, on coming to this kingdom, to be considered natural-born subjects?
Tract no. 2: Reply to the re-statement of Mr. Chalmer's opinion on the legal effects resulting from the acknowledged Independence of the United States. Signed: A barrister
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Citizenship--Great Britain
